biotools.summary: Accurately identifying homopolymers in cDNA sequences using Hidden Markov Models. This can be extended to trimming poly(A)/poly(T) tails, or identifying A,C,G,T,or N homopolymer sequences.

bioschemas.name: SCOPE++
